description: Bloodsnarl Raiders are savage warriors belonging to a nomadic tribe known for their brutality and thirst for blood. Their hulking forms are covered in tribal tattoos and war paint, and they wield massive axes adorned with the skulls of their enemies. They are feared for their relentless aggression and their ability to incite frenzy in their allies.
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Frenzied Assault
traits.description: When the Bloodsnarl Raider drops to half its hit points or less, it can make an additional melee attack as a bonus action.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The Bloodsnarl Raider has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the raider's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Throwing Axe
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
